“iOS and Android app made with React Native and Redux. It uses Asos' hackathon Api which provides only a search query. The goal was to see how many features I could implement with a minimal Api. This app is full of hacks”

ASOS STORE

DELECIPES

“ES6 jQuery SCSS Bootstrap Gulp. A Web app to see the latest movie and TV serie releases from TMDB's database along with trailers, similar recomandations and production and actors' info. All build into a Popcorn Time style theme.”
